name: GearHead 2
description:
This is the sequel to GearHead: Arena.  Five years after the Typhon Incident, tensions are high in the L5 region as all sides prepare for a possible war between Earth and Luna. The arrival of a mysterious new pirate fleet has further destabilized this vulnerable region.

GearHead2 is open source; you can download the Pascal source code from GitHub.

Try it out and let me know what you think.
